original_title: Like a Sugar Cube in a Cup of Tea
overview: This film examines the issues facing the community in Sweden. It contains interviews with lay Mandaeans, with Ganzibra Salam in Stockholm, and also footage of baptism and a wedding ceremony, and of traditional Mandaean singing as practised in Iran by Mr Asaad Askeri.
title: Like a Sugar Cube in a Cup of Tea
